summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Help My New multi-language service marketplace MVP. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend UI working with minor navigation timing issues. All core features tested successfully including user registration, authentication, categories, language switching, and protected routes.

design_issues.issue: Navigation from navbar to categories page sometimes has timing issues, but page works correctly when accessed directly

passed_tests: Categories retrieval with multi-language support (es, en, fr)
Landing page loads with hero section and categories
Categories page displays all 15 service categories
Google OAuth button presence and functionality
